name: Air Times
overview: Localised series air times from TheTVDB
description: Air Times is a plugin for Jellyfin that localises series air times provided by TheTVDB to your servers timezone. Must be above the original TheTVDB plugin in the metadata sources list.

versions.changelog:
- Support for localised individual episode air times
- Rename metadata source to "TheTVDB (Air Times)"

Initial release
- Support for localised series air times
